title: Rambling Biden Returns | Guests: Sen. Rand Paul & Rep. Nunes | 7/22/21
description:
Rep. Devin Nunes calls in to give us an update on the Durham investigation and Nancy Pelosi’s “outrageous” control over the Capitol riot select committee. Marxists are making our kids into activists. Glenn and “special guest” Vinny the Democratic pollster review CNN’s town hall with President Biden. Legendary guitar player Eric Clapton announces he won’t play shows at venues that requires proof of vaccination. Sen. Rand Paul joins to discuss Dr. Fauci’s apparent lie regarding funding of gain-of-function research and the origins of COVID-19. Is global warming actually a good thing? Senior fellow with the Committee to Unleash Prosperity David Simon calls in to share facts about climate change that the Left doesn’t want you to know.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
